page.title: 02PENNARD
page.content: I live in a small village outside {Bishopston}called{Pennard,}a very small community with many clubs which take place in the Community Hall. I belong to an Indoor bowls Club but there are others e.g. Archery, Mother and Toddler group and Badminton. Everyday I get out my bike and cycle up the road to walk 2 dogs. Besides the clubs there is a shop nearby, a Library, a Doctors Surgery, a Primary school,the nearest city is{Swansea. Here you can get anything you want without getting wet as the Quadrant is all under cover. I live in a semi-detatched house with a very large garden. My grandma lives with us and I have a pet cat and 3 goldfish in our garden pond. Every Saturday we go for a walk down to the nearby beach. SANDRA WARNER 2S
